data.taskTitle: Collapse plan UI after submission to show terminal
Collapse plan UI after submission to show terminal
data.approach: Add a collapsed state to CreatePlan that triggers after context is sent. When collapsed, the left panel condenses to a compact bar showing session info and action buttons, giving the terminal panel the majority of vertical space. Works in both stacked (drawer) and side-by-side (full page) modes.
